transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] kya tha? [inaudible] nahi laga.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Ji sir, good evening. Sneh Prakash baat kar raha hu.

Customer: Ha Sneh sir.

Executive: Ji sir. Sir aapka sab kuch final confirmation ho ki update aaya hai hamare paas ki hum kya kar sakte hai. To sir management ka yahi kehna hai

Executive: jab tak ki bina GST verified na hum aapko platform ka access abhi de nahi payenge. Hamare compliance issue ke karan.

Executive: Theek hai? Jo hamare market place ka rules and regulation hai uske accordance mein chalte hue hum aapko access nahi de payenge jab tak aapka GST verify na ho jaye sir.

Executive: To isi karan se jo aapne second option hame diya tha ki hum aapka jo services hai usko band karke jo aapka refund hai wo hum initiate karwa de. To us process ke liye hum ready hai sir. Aapka confirmation chahiye tha.

Customer: Ha, theek hai, karwa dijiye.

Executive: Theek hai sir. To sir main aaj ke date pe aapki services deactivate kar de raha hu, karwa dunga aur pro rata basis pe jo aapka kya refund ban raha hai wo aapko mail pe proper tarike se hamare IndiaMART ke side se each data calculation aapko chala jayega sir.

Executive: Theek hai?

Customer: Theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai sir. Thank you sir. Thank you so much.

Customer: Okay, thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's GST not verified.

- Unable to access platform due to compliance issues.

- Wants refund initiated.



Resolution:

- Agreed to deactivate services.

- Refund will be initiated on pro-rata basis.

- Calculation will be sent via email.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, verification, refund, deactivation
